arts.ttl: UK police arrest 6 ahead of soccer match between Aston Villa and Israeli club Maccabi Tel Aviv
arts.sum: British police said six people were arrested Thursday evening ahead of Aston Villa’s Europa League soccer match with Maccabi Tel Aviv in Birmingham, a match that has seen fans of the Israeli team banned. Palestinian flags and banners calling for a boycott of Israel had also been placed on the ground beside Trinity Road amid pro-Gaza chants.

arts.ttl: Police make six arrests ahead of Aston Villa vs Maccabi Tel Aviv
arts.sum: West Midlands Police have made six arrests as part of their operation ahead of Aston Villa's Europa League fixture with Maccabi Tel Aviv.
